reviews.text: Great movie.... very light hearted ... didn't took my interest off even for one second... SAQUIB. Is great in the movie as always 👍🏻👍🏻

Amazing film, I just loved it. Really a nice movie. It is funny, interesting and romantic too.
Has some really good funny moments, very authentic story. No melodrama. It is such a simple and cute love story.

This rom-com focuses more on romance and less on comedy. The writing is mediocre, most of the stand-up punches fall flat, and humour beyond the stage is not that enjoyable.From the trailer, the plot renders freshness and looked promising but the movie is poorly executed. The makers are failed to deliver an endearing love story.Saqib Saleem and Shweta Basu Prasad deliver decent performances and they share watchable chemistry. Rajesh Tailang, Pranay Manchanda, and Jasmeet Singh Bhatia done justice to their supporting roles.Direction 2/5 Acting 2.5/5 Dialogues 2/5 Story 1.5/5 Screenplay 2/5
Thought this would be something new but it was just the same cliched recycled love story you see in films. Not worth a watch.
Nothing amusing about two stand up comics who happen to be in love.limp listless bland and boring.2 stars

Zee5 has been a campaigner sorts of boring and average movies and webseries. One more joins the most. It isn't a funny rom com type films but a long sobbing yet sometimes soothing film on relationships more than comedy. Somehow a lot of people don't consume such things and would not even watch it. On the writing front nothing new, music is really good, felt Aadar Malik could have played the male protagonist rather than Shakib it would have looked more natural and real. But Sweta Basu Prasad has been making her presence felt and completely justifies her National award. It's a tiring one time watch and Zee5 could have brought in a comedian for a stand-up special than this but nevertheless it isn't killing so watching it won't kill you.

Comedy Couple is a light breezy entertainer that's a refreshing take on romance and relationships. The story of the film is nothing to write home about however introducing stand-up comedy brings freshness to it. The film doesn't take itself too seriously and the light treatment works in its favour. The story about a live in comic couple who fall apart to eventually get back together stays afloat due to a decent dose of humor and crackling chemistry between the lead pair. Both Saqib Saleem and Shweta Basu Prasad look lovely together and perform well in their respective roles. Their stand-up acts are a treat to watch. Director Nachiket Samant does a fine job. Perhaps the music and comedy could have been better but the film remains consistently watchable due to a nice lead pair and a light-hearted treatment to the story. It's a welcome change with so many crime thrillers coming out on various OTT platforms. Streaming on Zee5 it can be watched once.

Don't look for reviews.. it's a very good movie & entertaining one. All the stars has done their work superbly. It's a light hearted rom-com movie so don't expect it to be a laugh riot but still it makes you laugh so much at some point. Movie is entertaining & if you come from an urban family or you understand urban jokes than just GO FOR IT.
This movie is not comedy at all... It is hurting religious sentiment of people... Such movies should be banned

Finished watching Comedy couple and I absolutely loved it. It is billed as comedy and I did laugh out loud frequently but it is also a touching drama of relationship. It had a very sweet touch mixing the comedy and drama. It's not just a rom-com it's most certainly a rom-com-dram.I haven't seen a film so effortlessly balance all the three genres.The comedy couple uses witty humour, charming leads and socially important topics to give us the best rom-com film of the year so far. It perfectly portrays how one lie can destroy everything. This movie makes us realise how difficult it is for a stand up comedian to do comedy when they are sad. Saqib Saleem was fantastic as Deep Sharma. He played his part effortlessly. Saqib Saleem shines in his role. Can't stop gushing over his cuteness. He made me laugh and cry at the same time. He is an amazing actor Also loved Shweta Basu Prasad. Every actor in this film has done the most brilliant job.You can see Saqib grace the screen with his charming presence. Saqib Saleem and Shweta Basu Prasad's on-screen chemistry is unmissable. The funniest film shot in lockdown so far .

Although the storyline is somewhat predictable, the cast gave very good performances from the leads all the way down to the smaller roles. Since we were playing close attention to the dialogues, we managed to catch several gems in the writing that had us smiling.It is not a comedy in thse sense of rolling-on-the-floor-laughing, it is very amusing to watch and the cast seems to be having a good time too.Kudos to everyone involved the making of the film.

Poor execution of a fantastic plot .... Unnecessary comedies which will make you to think why it was there .... Overall kuch samajh mein nahi aayega ... and based on outdated mockery of religious platforms
A unique subject - love story of Stand up couples. The movie paces through sweet and funny moments, a perfect light heart drama. Well done to the makers.

Comedy couple Suppper cute rom-com..If u r a couple or have recently broke up u gonna love it even much mre..watch it out for d extremely talented Rangbaaz who has Crackdown all d hurdles and proving his talent one aftr d other - Saqib Salem.. D best part of d whole movie was him..even Shweta prasad ws also very good bt he ws unmatchable wid his performance full of cuteness and emotions!!!Der r several instances which r really amazing and make u fall in love wid d duo. Be it d gal proposing using a rubber band or d guy making ice coffee for her evryday bfr she wakes up!! Also sticking on to each other even after several months when u r falling apart is shown in a vry impressive way.D song 'Kya ye tumhe pata hai' is jst mind-blowing.. Released on zee5 premium!! Watch out

This film full of comedy will entertain you completely. The director has brought the relationships of metropolitan life to the screen on the pretext of Deep and Zoya's story.Media and conservative ideology have also been attacked fiercely in the film. Taking up the theme of 'Go Mutra', the director in the film has also tried to satirize about 'freedom of expression'.In the 21st century, everyone claims to be modern, but when it comes to living in a live-in relationship of a boy and a girl, the high society and people who consider themselves very modern, also show their true colors. Huh. This is the focus of the entire story of this film.ZEE5's one-hour 55-minute comedy Couple is basically a film to attract the youth of the metros who find moments of laughter in the face of problems and tensions.Bikas Ranjan Mishra, Raghav Raj Kakkar, Kashyap Kapoor and Gaurav Sharma write and devlope the story of ZEE5 film Comedy Couple.Constant hiccups arise in this relationship and stability does not come easily. The comedy couple states that the two were raised in a completely different way. While Zoya is a self-sufficient girl made of a single mother (Pooja Bedi), Deep is a young man from a traditional Hindu family, who cannot rebel and adjust herself to the rites of childhood.The good part of the story is that in this, along with the couple, every effort has been made to bring out the changing political-social environment of the country. The film could have been tightened a bit.There are no chances of laughing out loud in the film, but Saqib and Shweta have handled the opportunities of stand-up comedy.A chemistry between Saqib and Shweta is fantastic. In particular, Shweta has flourished in the film beautifully and effectively.She is doing a consistently good job in the web world and this role of Zoya is noticeable.Pooja Bedi has returned to the entertainment world after nine years.Director Nachiket Samant has made Marathi films before this. This is his first Hindi film. Certainly, he retained the Metro feel of the story from beginning to end.He has given the two main characters of his film 'Comedy Couple' their separate zones. For this reason, the entire cast of the film 'Comedy Couple' is actually on its director Nachiket Samanta.ZEE5 film Comedy Couple's story keeps you feeling from beginning to end. The film could have been tightened a bit but this film will tickle the minds of the metro youth.
